      • writeInt

        public static void writeInt(int number,
            java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream byteStream)
        Helper function for writing an int to byte array, in an architecture-independent way.
        Parameters:
        number - Integer to write to steam
        byteStream - Byte array output stream for writing exactly 4 bytes of integer.

      • writeLong

        public static void writeLong(long number,
             java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream byteStream)
        Helper function for writing a long to byte array, in an architecture-independent way.
        Parameters:
        number - Long to write to steam
        byteStream - Byte array output stream for writing exactly 8 bytes of long.

      • writeByteArray

        public static void writeByteArray(byte[] data,
                  java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream byteStream)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Helper function for writing a byte array to a byte stream, preceded by the length of the byte array as an int.
        Parameters:
        data - The byte array to append to stream.
        byteStream - The stream to write to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeString

        public static void writeString(java.lang.String string,
               java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream byteStream)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Helper function for writing a string to byte array. Appends 4-byte count followed by String in ASCII.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to append to byte array.
        byteStream - Byte array output stream for writing
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        input - the input stream
        Returns:
        integer representation of first four bytes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getByteArray

        public static byte[] getByteArray(java.io.BufferedInputStream input)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the length of byte array as an integer, followed by the integer.
        Parameters:
        input - the input stream.
        Returns:
        byte array of length n, after reading n from input.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getString

        public static java.lang.String getString(java.io.BufferedInputStream input)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the length of a string as an integer, followed by the string.
        Parameters:
        input - the input stream
        Returns:
        ASCII string of length n, after reading int n from input.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getBytes

        public static byte[] getBytes(java.io.BufferedInputStream input,
              int byteCount)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Blocking function to get byte array from input stream (blocking code)
        Parameters:
        input - the input stream to read from.
        byteCount - the number of bytes to read.
        Returns:
        byteCount bytes. Throws IOException if hits EOF first.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
